        public void sendUpdateMySettings(boolean sounds,
                                 int volume,
                                 boolean notifications,
                                 boolean calls,
                                 boolean messages,
                                 boolean connections)
        Send an update settings request to server, it will answer later
        Parameters:
        sounds - CheckBox to mute/unmute general sounds
        volume - Slider (0 to 100 percent) for general sounds
        notifications - CheckBox to have sounds in case of notification
        calls - CheckBox to have sounds in case of incoming call
        messages - CheckBox to have sounds in case of incoming message
        connections - CheckBox to have sounds in case of contact connections
